changeSet.author: mdaly
changeSet.comment: Create table to store report boilerplate Versions
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `prodlims`.`version` ( `id` BIGINT(20) PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `testType` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `effectiveDate` DATE NOT NULL, `directory` VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL, `displayedValue` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `description` VARCHAR(255), `conditionClassName` VARCHAR(2048) NOT NULL );
